posts.name: DNarendran
posts.cooked:
Screenshot 2024-08-13 135904666×516 24 KB

@s.anand sir, @Amit1 @carlton The instructions given in the portal, for questions indicated with ‘S’, your answer is string entered within double qoutes.

whereas in the sample submision file there are no qoutes.
Please clarify.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Naren,

Please use strings in double quotes as mentioned in the instructions. The sample file will be corrected.

Kind regards

posts.name: DNarendran
posts.cooked:
with strings, it was showing that my submission contains wrong answers, whereas without strings there was no error and i submitted the same.

Please confirm if it is the correct format.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
1. Create CSV using Notepad. Microsoft Excel does not produce pure CSVs.
  2. You MUST use double quotes for strings.

eg.

Q14,“How be the best by Naren”
Q4,2453

  1. You must answer all the questions

If you follow these guidelines and all your answers are correct, you will have no problem in your submissions.

Kind regards

posts.name: DNarendran
posts.cooked:
Without qoutes i did not get the ‘wrong answer error’

I entered the answers in google spreadsheet, downloaded as csv, and then uploaded in the portal, did not get the ’ your submission has wrong answers’ alert.

Submitted the same.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: I’ll ask JK to check your specific submission.

posts.name: Yash karsh
posts.cooked: Sir, same issue with me. When I put the String with double quotes then it shows a “wrong answers” error. But without double quotes, it’s not showing any error. Sir Please Clarify

posts.name: Rajat Shenoi
posts.cooked:
@carlton A suggestion for the future Projects in the next term. Instead of asking us to create a csv and upload it, please mandate us to type the CSV file contents directly into the portal just like how the EMQ assignments for Statistics were conducted. They were also CSV format, so the grading checkers don’t need to be changed.

Half of the problems on discourse are related to the format issues caused by the software they are using which can be easily avoided.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Rajat,

I will forward your suggestion to the operations team. I certainly do not want to spend days on portal solving software glitches as it wastes both yours and my time. I am resolved to make sure this never happens again in the next term.

Thanks once again for your suggestion.
Kind regards

posts.name: DNarendran
posts.cooked: @carlton could you please confirm, if the submission was in order. If not i will try too resubmit , before the deadline. Thanks in advance.

posts.name: Swati Jain
posts.cooked:
Solution to TDS Project "Wrong answer thing" Tools in Data Science
Hello, I saw a lot of my friends still struggling with wrong answer thing which says - Your submission has wrong answers. Please recheck the submission Solution - Use notepad or simple text editors Format Q1, 678 Q2,“Answer” Q3,7.89 Save as csv file you can name it anything. Why without quotes thing is working yet not recommended??? When you use Excel or Google sheets - they by default add quotes for strings (See image below - it doesn’t have correct answers just shared for format) s…
